timelineEvents.title: Initial Complaint Sent
timelineEvents.description: Comprehensive complaint email sent to Municipal Commissioner detailing absence of qualified supervisor, extensive repair needs, and animals exposed to harsh weather.
keyPoints: Absence of qualified supervisor for three months
Extensive repair needs for SPCA building
Exposed animals facing harsh weather conditions

timelineEvents.title: Maneka Gandhi Intervention
timelineEvents.description: Smt. Maneka Gandhi personally contacted the Municipal Commissioner (Anindita Mitra) to address concerns about SPCA Chandigarh conditions.
keyPoints: Personal intervention by prominent animal welfare advocate

timelineEvents.title: Meeting with Municipal Commissioner
timelineEvents.description: Meeting with Municipal Commissioner resulting in several commitments including supervisor recruitment, camera installation, and improved monitoring.
keyPoints: Installation of cameras with feed to MC commissioner
Relocation of bovines to gaushala in Raipur Kalan
Creation of isolation kennel for aggressive dogs
Agreement to monthly meetings with volunteers

timelineEvents.title: Leadership Transition
timelineEvents.description: MC Commissioner Anindita Mitra's term ended; responsibility temporarily assigned to DC Chandigarh. Honorary General Secretary also retired.
keyPoints: End of term for key leadership figure
Retirement of instrumental Honorary General Secretary
Loss of continuity in policy implementation

timelineEvents.title: Veterinary Officer Issues Raised
timelineEvents.description: Formal request made for increased involvement of Veterinary Officer Dr. Munish Sharma, who was stationed 100m from SPCA but rarely visited the facility.
keyPoints: Request for at least twice-weekly documented visits
Highlighting critical role of Veterinary Officer per PCA Act
Need for regular meetings led by VO

timelineEvents.title: Diwali Night Staff Absence
timelineEvents.description: Critical staff absence during Diwali night when animals needed emergency care due to fireworks. Appointed doctor, medical staff, ambulance driver, and van duty worker all absent.
keyPoints: Complete staff absence during high-risk period
Animals frightened by fireworks injured on roads
No disciplinary action taken despite reports

timelineEvents.title: Comprehensive Issues Report
timelineEvents.description: Detailed report submitted documenting persistent issues despite some improvements in cleanliness and organization under Supervisor Saurav Sharma.
keyPoints: Failure to protect visitors and volunteers from harassment
Gross discipline failure during Diwali night
Pending structural repairs and ambulance procurement
Ongoing issues with essential supplies procurement
Lack of supervision during evening shifts

timelineEvents.title: Landline Service Disconnection
timelineEvents.description: SPCA landline service disconnected due to non-payment of bills, hampering emergency communications and public access.

timelineEvents.title: Kennel Repairs Undertaken
timelineEvents.description: Repairs to front kennels initiated as documented in WhatsApp communications, showing some progress on infrastructure improvements.

timelineEvents.title: Staff Salary Delays Reported
timelineEvents.description: Reports that staff salaries remained unpaid for over two months, affecting morale and potentially contributing to absenteeism.

timelineEvents.title: Essential Supplies Procurement Delayed
timelineEvents.description: Procurement of jute bori (sacks) for animal protection during winter delayed due to administrative bottlenecks.
keyPoints: Animals exposed to harsh winter conditions

timelineEvents.title: Rehabilitated Birds Released
timelineEvents.description: Successful rehabilitation and release of 15 pigeons, demonstrating some positive animal welfare outcomes despite challenges.

timelineEvents.title: Volunteer Frustration and Decreased Engagement
timelineEvents.description: Reports of volunteer frustration leading to decreased engagement due to persistent unresolved issues despite repeated appeals.

timelineEvents.title: SPCA.wtf Transparency Portal Launched
timelineEvents.description: Launch of SPCA.wtf document transparency portal to provide public access to all documentation regarding SPCA Chandigarh issues.
